scene1.quote2:
What happened? I was taking care of my little pigs
when all of a sudden everything turned white.
scene1.quote3:
What are you talking about?
This is a miracle!
scene1.quote5: I was just combing my hair!
scene1.quote6:
Looks like we've been teleported
here from different places.
scene1.quote7:
How?\| Who was the bastard who did this?
If I find him I'll give him a nice slap!

wave1.quote1:
I'm a little lost, but let's try
to figure out what to do.
Arg!\| My hair is all messed up.
wave1.quote2: Not even to teleport my hair comb along.

wave1.quote1: This must be the goddess call.
